short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your MonadPlug DSP experience easier with dynamic creative imports

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MonadPlug DSP Dynamic Creative Import is used to enter a website URL and dynamically import articles/products from that website into your MonadPlug DSP campaign as creative. You can choose the platform you want to import your creatives from and your profile link on that platform. After that click submit and the results will populate. After clicking the add button, the ad should be imported.

Note that you must be on your campaign page for the extension to work (https://advertiser.monadplug.com/advertiser/campaigns/{your campaign ID})
